title: Listener Stories: Vol. 45
description:
Happy spooky season, everyone!! We've got some WILD, seasonal tales for you today from your very own scary experiences... join us for a soaking wet seance, a distastefully hung ghost decoration paired with a possessed doll and some video evidence from a badass Canadian liquor store haunting. Christine also serenades us with a now traditional, "Halloween-time is here"... and that's why we drink!

Please consider supporting the companies that support us!


Go to Thrive Market.com/DRINK. Join today and you’ll

get a FREE gift of your choosing, up to $24 dollars in value.


Make getting dressed the easiest part of your routine at jennikayne.com.

Get 20% off your first order when you use code DRINK at checkout.


Special offer for ATWWD listeners: get 10% off your first month at betterhelp.com/drink


Right now, just for our listeners, go to HuntAKiller.com/BWDRINK use promo code BWDRINK at check out for 20% off your first box.
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
